name: Coursera-webdev
tagline: Repo for a web development course from Coursera
body:
### Welcome!
This is a page for some projects and assignments from the Coursera course: [HTML, CSS, and Javascript for Web Developers](https://www.coursera.org/learn/html-css-javascript-for-web-developers)

## Module 2 coding assignment - Building a responsive site
You can see a responsive web page [here!](http://dhananjaih.github.io/coursera-webdev/mod2-solution)

Did it work? I sure hope so.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
